lead_paragraph: The charitable foundation led by former President Bill Clinton will no longer accept foreign and corporate donations if Hillary Clinton is elected president and will hold its final annual Clinton Global Initiative meeting in September regardless of the outcome of the November election.

headline.main: Clinton Charity to Limit Donations if Hillary Clinton Wins
headline.print_headline: Clinton Charity to Limit Donations if Hillary Clinton Wins
